entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
